Error!

This is a generic Error Page rendered without any templating.

If you are seeing this message your Twig (and/or Composer) may be disabled in the configuration file.

You don't need to use any template system, Composer or even MOODFIRED to build your site using this Boilerplate.

For more details and suggestions about coding practices and how to take advantage of this Boilerplate structure please refer to the documentation.

You can find the HTML file for this page (error.html) in the "pages/static/" folder of your site.

Feel free to modify this page as needed. However, it would be much better to adjust your configuration file to route errors to a different page, if needed.
